title: I am literally SUPER depressed cause no one IRL wsnts to date me.
body:
I feel lonely, I feel small, I feel unwanted and worthless and unlovable.

I have actually been stalked, bullied and harassed by people and I can't take it anymore.

Even last Thursday I actually got raped by someone I thought loved me and wanted s relatii ship with me. I let it slide cause it is so hard to find someone to love and whatever else... That wants s relationship.

I can't talk to my friends about this or anyone else. I literally only have Gzd and I feel like I could burst with emotion...
I hate everything about myself. I feel TOTALLY worthless.

I just wanted to be in a relationship and loved. 

I actually would fucking give away my master account and quit league FOREVER just for love. I just feel so fucking worthless and depressed.

I am 22 years old and I fucking HATE eveyrhting about myself. I am not going to self harm so don't go there. But fuck sake I am in pain.
